Step 1: Pick up the first 1/3 parts of the boards and put them down. Step 2: Pick up the other 1/3 parts of the boards and put them down to another place. Step 3: Pick up the last 1/3 parts of the boards and put it down in another place.
No, it's not evenly distributed.

Due to the thinness of the wooden board, I should press my fingers on both sides of the first layer of the board with both hands and lift it with force. Alternatively, I could gently push out the first layer of the board and then lift it up.
They are boards. Board is a flat, slender, rectangular piece of wood. Plank is mainly used in ship construction, housing, Bridges, and other fields. It is also used for shelves and tables.
This is a dinosaur, specifically a Tyrannosaurus rex, which was lived in the Late Cretaceous period, around 68-66 million years ago.

The food sources of dinosaurs depended largely on their species. Herbivorous dinosaurs primarily fed on plants, such as ferns, leaves, and plant stems. Carnivorous dinosaurs ate other animals, including small mammals, fish, and other dinosaurs.
It leans forward, as if to sprint or run, possibly to start hunting.
This is a black handgun, along with a spare magazine.
China, Japan, South Korea, Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Luxembourg, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, etc. Using of pistols are prohibited in these countries.

This is a pistol, a small short-barreled light weapon that can be fired with a single hand grip. It is mostly used in close combat and self-defense, and the penetration and stopping effect of the pistol are much lower than that of the rifle round.
Position the pistol, grasp the grip with either the left or right hand, aim according to the sights, and pull the trigger with the index finger to fire.
He is wearing a pair of yellow shorts and some jewelry.
His has long nose and big ear, like an elephant.
He might be a knight, samurai or ninja.
He held a sword in his left hand, and his right hand was empty.

Samurai culture, rooted in feudal Japan, embodies honor, loyalty, and martial prowess. Samurai adhere to Bushido, the "Way of the Warrior," emphasizing virtues like courage, integrity, and self-discipline. They serve their lord with unwavering loyalty, uphold honor through duels, and prioritize self-improvement through rigorous training and meditation.
This object is a dice, so it might be used at game places like bars and gambling houses.
This is a cube.
It is number 6 that on the opposite of the number 1 on this object.
This object has 6 sides.
Step 1: Roll the dice. Step 2: If the dice hits 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5, roll it again. Step 3: If the dice hits 6, stop rolling and show the roll of the dice.

This is dice, small throwable props with marks on each side to generate random numbers, are ancient gambling devices. Dice are commonly used in table games, such as dice games, board games, role-playing games, game games, etc. The most common die is a 6-sided die, which is a regular cube with 1 to 6 holes (or numbers) on each side, and the sum of the numbers on the opposite sides must be 7.
This is a doughnut, which is mainly made of dough, sugar and cream.

A doughnut is a kind of sweet food that is mixed with flour, granulated sugar, cream, eggs, and fried. The two most common shapes are hollow rings and closed doughnuts with sweet fillings such as cream and custard in the middle of the dough. In the United States, many people eat doughnuts as a breakfast staple, and there are doughnut days. In Asia, doughnuts are mainly eaten as a snack.
The top of the doughnut is pink and covered with syrup and icing sugar, and the bottom is brown and just bread.
A lesser force.
It's a gym.
Major events such as sports games or concerts can be held in this place.
Trees are planted on the side near the main entrance.
Move left or right along the building until you reach the rear of the gym.
This object can be used as decoration, to show a festive atmosphere.
The top of the lantern.

The making of Chinese lanterns involves crafting a bamboo frame and covering it with thin, colorful paper. Intricate designs are cut into the paper, creating patterns and images. A candle or bulb is placed inside, illuminating the lantern. Traditional techniques passed down through generations ensure craftsmanship and cultural significance.

The Chinese lantern symbolizes illumination, enlightenment, and hope. Its radiant glow represents the pursuit of knowledge, wisdom, and guidance in life's journey. As a cultural emblem, it embodies joy, prosperity, and good fortune, illuminating paths both literal and metaphorical, guiding souls towards their aspirations and dreams.
The tassel of the lantern is hanging on the bottom.
The object consists of two towers and a bridge connecting them.
Kuala Lumpur.

From front and back what you can see will be two towers on a foundation, connecting by a bridge. From the bottom, you can only see the foundation. From the top, there will be the spires of two towers, as well as the bridge, and from left and right you will see only one tower on the foundation.

Petronas Twin Towers, completed in 1998, were once the world's tallest buildings at 452 meters. Designed by Cesar Pelli, they symbolize Malaysia's economic growth and feature Islamic motifs. Constructed by the Malaysian oil company Petronas, the towers are iconic landmarks in Kuala Lumpur, renowned for their sleek design and engineering marvel.

Forks, spoons, and table knives are common eating utensils used in everyday life for various purposes. Forks are primarily used for piercing and picking up solid food item. Spoons are used for scooping and conveying liquids, semi-liquids, and foods with a sauce or broth. Table knives, also known as dinner knives, are used for cutting and slicing food on your plate. They are typically not as sharp as kitchen knives, as their primary purpose is to assist with cutting while dining.
There are 3 things in total. A fork, a spoon, and a table knife.
The item on the far left, the knife.

Step 1: Cut the steak with the knife. Step 2: Pick up the cut steak with the fork. Step 3: Feed the steak on the fork in your mouth. Step 4: Spoon the soup. Step 5: Feed the soup in the spoon in your mouth.
Step 1: Pick up the fork and the spoon. Step 2: Put down the spoon at the place of the fork. Step 3: Put down the fork at the place of the spoon.
Spoon is in the middle.
If changing the place of fork and knife, the spoon will still be in the middle.
The left one, knife, is the longest.
He could probably be a soldier. It could be on the battlefield or in the army.

Step 1: Pick out the leash. Step 2: Put the leash cross the dog's neck and back. Step 3: Tight the leash.

Cats are independent, aloof creatures, often preferring solitude and minimal interaction. They groom themselves meticulously and typically exhibit more reserved behaviors. Dogs are loyal, social animals, craving companionship and human interaction. They thrive on affection and require regular exercise and attention to maintain their well-being.
Animated style.
She is a medical worker.
She is standing with two hands raised on both sides.
She is wearing protective clothing and two medical gloves. The protective clothing is blue while the medical gloves are green.

Surgery is a subject of modern medicine that deals with the use of surgery to treat patients. Surgery, referred to as surgery, refers to the process of entering the human body or other biological tissues through instruments, under the operation of surgeons or other professionals, to eliminate lesions, change structures or implant foreign objects by external means.
Right hand.
This is a snowman with a hat on his head.
It's a black bowler hat.
This object is made of snow, so while temperature goes up or it is set near flame, it might melt into water.

The top of this bucket has a lid.
It's a cat, who can be a domestic pet of the human.

The cat, a small carnivorous mammal, is beloved for its independent nature, soft fur, and graceful movements. With retractable claws, keen senses, and a flexible body, it prowls silently, hunting rodents and insects. Cats communicate through meows, purrs, and body language, forming strong bonds with their human companions.
Step 1: Open the cage. Step 2: Catch the cat. Step 3: Put the cat into the cage and lock it.
Its ears, limbs, and the area on the back near the neck is black.

The panda is a kind of mammal belonging to the carnivorous order Ursidae, and its body color is black and white. The panda is a unique species in China and is regarded as a living fossil in the biological world. The panda's black and white appearance makes it popular with people and has a large number of fans around the world. Pandas are also important representatives of China to show friendship to each other in diplomatic activities.
Left hand.
Christmas Day.
The bowknot is behind her head.

The barrels are stacked in two layers, the bottom layer is three yellow barrels, and the top layer is a yellow barrel and a rusted barrel in the gap between the bottom three buckets. The whole buckets look like a triangle.
No.
The number of yellow barrels is 4 while the number of rusty barrels is 1, so the result of multiply is 4.
Step 1: Clamp the rusty barrel, which is on the top right corner. Step 2: Take it down from the height. Step 3: Turn around and place its bottom on the ground.

This symbol means nuclear radiation. Nuclear radiation is the emission of particles or electromagnetic waves from the nucleus of an unstable atom undergoing radioactive decay. It includes alpha, beta, and gamma radiation, each with different properties and penetration abilities. Radiation can ionize atoms, causing damage to cells and DNA, leading to various health risks.
Man.
This man's back is hidden by clothes.
His cloak was attached to his shoulder armor and hung on his back.

"Lord of the Rings" features Legolas, an elf archer skilled in combat. In "The Hobbit" series, Tauriel showcases her archery prowess. In "The Witcher" TV series, the character of Filavandrel demonstrates elven archery skills. These characters add depth and excitement to their respective stories with their expert marksmanship.
The bow is holding in her hand with an arrow rested on the bowstring.

Elves are mythical creatures found in folklore worldwide, often depicted as youthful, beautiful beings with pointed ears and magical abilities. They typically inhabit forests or enchanted realms, known for their craftsmanship, archery skills, and connection to nature. Elves feature prominently in various mythologies, literature, and popular culture.

This is a carved pumpkin.
Halloween.

Pumpkin, a versatile winter squash, boasts a vibrant orange hue and a round shape with ribbed skin. Rich in nutrients like vitamin A, C, and fiber, it offers a sweet, earthy flavor. Often used in cooking, baking, and carving for festivities, it symbolizes autumn and harvest abundance in various cultures.
This is pumpkin, so you should apply less force.

Step 1: Put the dishes into water. Step 2: Wipe the dishes with a cloth dipped in dish soap. Step 3: Rinse the foam off the dishes.

Sushi is a kind of Japanese cuisine, the main material is to use vinegar, sugar, salt seasoning, fat and slightly sweet Japanese pearl rice cooked into vinegar rice, after cooling with fish, seafood, vegetables, eggs or other meat and other ingredients.
This is a hot woman with long hair in a ponytail, wearing shorts and a bra.
Her hands are put on her leg.
She is sitting cross-legged, with her hands put on her leg, assuming a meditation posture.
He is a centaur.
He is standing in the posture of a centaur, with his arms outstretched.

A centaur is a mythical creature from Greek mythology, depicted as having the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse. Known for their strength and wild nature, centaurs often appear in stories as both fearsome warriors and untamed beings associated with forests and wilderness.
This is a rocket.

A rocket symbolizes a nation's technological prowess, military strength, and scientific advancement. It enables space exploration, satellite deployment, national defense, and international prestige. Rockets facilitate communication, weather forecasting, navigation, and scientific research, contributing significantly to a country's security, economy, and global influence.
This object is an ant who lives in groups and has a clear division of labor.

The ant is a truly social insect belonging to the family Hymenoptera. Ants are completely metamorphosed insects, which develop into adult insects through stages such as eggs, larvae, and pupae. They work differently in groups depending on their individual form.

The queen ant is the adult female ant with reproductive ability in the ant nest, and the whole ant colony is the offspring of the queen ant. Depending on the species, some species may have only one queen in a single nest, while others may have hundreds of fertile queens in a single nest at the same time. Queens can live for up to 30 years.
It's a bathtub, and people can take a bath in it.
The bathtub is mostly made of china.
It might break if hit by something hard.
Its drainage outlet is on the left side.
It is black and has some moss.
Step 1: Plug the outlet tightly and fill the tub with water. Step 2: Add detergent to the water. Step 3: Scrub the tub with a rag, etc. Step 4: Drain the dirty water from the outlet
This is a homestead or manor with a main house, a small side house and fence around them.

It is a homestead or manor, in which there is a main house, a small house on the side, with a fence around them. The main house has an open door several Windows, and two loft-style Windows on either side of the eaves. Only one circular arch is open in the side room.
Fence.
This is a homestead or manor, which can hold several people to live in and plant some crops.
SpongeBob.

"SpongeBob SquarePants" is a beloved animated series created by Stephen Hillenburg. Set in the underwater town of Bikini Bottom, it follows the adventures of SpongeBob, a cheerful sea sponge, and his friends, featuring humor, absurdity, and life lessons. Launched in 1999, it remains a cultural phenomenon with enduring popularity worldwide.

Pink Starfish is SpongeBob's best friend and neighbor who lives under a rock in the fictional underwater city of Bikini Bottom. Patrick is known for his cheerful but somewhat dim-witted personality, often providing comic relief with his humorous antics and absurd logic. Despite his simple nature, Patrick has a big heart and is always there to support SpongeBob through their various adventures beneath the sea.
He opened his mouth wide, and extended his arms, displaying a look of astonishment.
This is SpongeBob. His prototype is a sponge, and the cartoon retains the pores on his body. The sponge breathes oxygen and absorbs nutrients from the water through these pores.
This is a ukulele.

This is a ukulele. The ukulele is smaller and typically has four strings, while the guitar is larger and usually has six strings. The ukulele produces a higher-pitched, more mellow sound compared to the guitar's broader range. Guitar chords and scales are transferable to the ukulele, but the instruments have distinct playing techniques and styles.
Use nylon to make strings and wood to make boards.
It has two knobs, which typically control the flow of hot water and cold water respectively.
It's a water tap which can control the water flow.
It has two knobs that can be rotated to allow water to flow from the faucet.

It's hard and has a smooth surface. Being made of metal, it has good thermal conductivity. Due to frequent exposure to water, corrosion-resistant and rustproof stainless steel materials are commonly used.
Step 1: Put a basin under the water tap. Step 2: Turn the switch to let water out. Step 3: Wait for the basin to fill up. Step 4: Turn off the tap. Step 5: Take out the basin full of water.
This is a Dragon. With wings on its back, it probably could fly.

The Western dragon is an evil legendary creature. Influenced by Greek mythology, dragons are the keepers of treasures, so. The dragon represents the evil symbol of greed and destruction, and unlike the Chinese dragon, which represents good fortune, the Western dragon likes to hoard and guard treasures, is curious, vengeful, and can breathe fire.

Here is a handle door for opening the oven, along with several knobs for setting temperature, time, and other functions.

This is a horse.

Horses can be ridden, which can improve the speed of a human, and thus can cause effect not only in people's common life like animal husbandry but also in terms of military aspects, like putting together a cavalry unit.

The horse, a majestic creature of the Equidae family, possesses strength, agility, and grace. With a powerful physique, flowing mane, and expressive eyes, it epitomizes beauty in motion. Domesticated for millennia, horses serve humanity in transportation, agriculture, sport, and companionship, forging an enduring bond between human and beast.
This is a knife with a knife sheath.

It's a knife. It has a wooden handle and a white body, wrapped in a delicate sheath. The knife sheath is made of leather, with a loop attached to the handle. The sheath covers most of the blade. The knife sheath itself is very delicate, with a complex pattern on it.

This is an ancient arch.

Countries with ancient arches include Italy, home to the iconic Roman arches like the Arch of Constantine in Rome; Jordan, featuring the stunning ruins of the ancient city of Petra with its intricate rock-cut arches; and Greece, showcasing remnants of arches in archaeological sites like the Acropolis in Athens.

Gambling is a game that uses valuable things to compete to win or lose. It is a form of entertainment for human beings. In Western society, it refers to betting money or something of material value on an event with an uncertain outcome, with the primary purpose of winning money or material value.

People began using hammers around 3.3 million years ago, during the Stone Age. Initially fashioned from stones and wood, they were primarily used for pounding and shaping materials like flint for tools and weapons. Over time, their design evolved, becoming indispensable in various tasks from construction to crafting.

Pokemon is an extremely popular and enduring Japanese multimedia franchise that includes an animated series, video games, trading card games, movies, and a variety of merchandise. The Pokemon animated series has been a big part of the series' success, attracting viewers of all ages around the world. The anime tells the adventures of a young man named Satoshi and his faithful companion Pikachu.

Coffee offers numerous benefits, including increased alertness, improved cognitive function, and enhanced mood due to its caffeine content. It may boost metabolism, aid in fat burning, and reduce the risk of certain diseases like Alzheimer's and Parkinson's. Its antioxidants also contribute to overall health and longevity.
Black spots on bananas indicate overripeness or bruising.
Bananas have a sweet, creamy taste with subtle notes of tartness. Their texture is soft and smooth, sometimes slightly fibrous, offering a satisfyingly delicate mouthfeel.
